mapper.select:
select*from (select*from (select infonum, infotitle, infocontent, to_char(infowritedate, 'YY/MM/DD') as infowritedate, infohit, infotype, infoattach from notice
where infotitle like '%${searchWord}%' and infotype=2
where infotype = 2
order by infonum desc) where rownum<=(${pageNum}*${onePageRecord}) order by infonum) where rownum<= ${lastPageRecord} ${onePageRecord} order by infonum desc
mapper.update: update notice set infohit = infohit + 1 where infonum=#{param1}
mapper.select: select * from (select infonum, infotype, lag(infonum, 1, 0) over (order by infonum desc) as prevNo, lag(infotitle, 1, '이전글이 없습니다.') over (order by infonum desc) as prevSubject, lead(infonum, 1, 0) over (order by infonum desc) as nextNo, lead(infotitle, 1, '다음글이 없습니다.') over (order by infonum desc) as nextSubject from notice order by infonum desc) where infonum = #{param1} and infotype=2
select count(infonum) totalRecord from notice where infotype=2
